commentary: Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Shami, out Shami Run Out,, 1 run completed
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Shami, FOUR, the game just about alive
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Shami, no run, third dot in a row
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Shami, no run, slower ball and well bowled outside off, Shami slogs and misses
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Shami, no run, dug in short on the stumps, Shami pulls and misses, hit on the helmet I think
Kuldeep Yadav to Pathirana, out Bowled,, Poor shot and India win
Kuldeep Yadav to Pathirana, no run, keeps low and turns in on the stumps, Pathirana does well to turn it to square leg
Kuldeep Yadav to Rajitha, out Bowled,, What a googly and knocked over
Hardik Pandya to Rajitha, 1 run, full and snaking back in on middle, flicked to mid-wicket and Rajitha is away
Hardik Pandya to Theekshana, out Caught by (sub)Suryakumar Yadav,, Fantastic catch and it is SKY
Hardik Pandya to Theekshana, no run, another grunty effort-filled length delivery from Hardik Pandya, on the stumps, defended to cover
Hardik Pandya to Theekshana, no run, back of a length on the stumps, 136kph and tight, Theekshana defends off the back foot
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, 1 run, back of a length outside off, Wellalage punches to sweeper cover
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, no run, full and wide outside off, Wellalage goes for a big loft and misses
Hardik Pandya to Theekshana, 1 run, good length on off, pushed to extra-cover and it's an easy single
Hardik Pandya to Theekshana, no run, dug in short at Theekshana who bends his head and lets it go
Hardik Pandya to Theekshana, no run, good stop by Kohli at cover, saves a run
Hardik Pandya to Theekshana, no run, wide of the crease and angling into middle and leg, nudged to mid-wicket
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, 1 run, fullish around off, Wellalage opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, FOUR, the luck is with Wellalage
Hardik Pandya to Dhananjaya, no run, lovely delivery, wide of the crease and back of a length outside off, extra bounce too, Dhananjaya tries to run it down and misses
Hardik Pandya to Dhananjaya, no run, full outside off, Dhananjaya gets forward to drive to mid-off
Hardik Pandya to Dhananjaya, no run, back of a length on the stumps, 137kph, Dhananjaya goes on the back foot to defend
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, 1 run, back of a length outside off, Wellalage stands tall to punch to sweeper cover
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, no run, good length and tight on the stumps, defended
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, no run, dug in short outside off, left alone
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, no run, nice delivery and Hardik Pandya follows through near Wellalage after beating him
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, no run, full outside off, moving away, left alone
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, no run, fullish outside off, angling away from Wellalage who hides the bat inside the pad to leave
Hardik Pandya to Dhananjaya, 1 run, good length just outside off, Dhananjaya runs it down to third man
Hardik Pandya to Dhananjaya, no run, beautiful delivery
Hardik Pandya to Wellalage, 1 run, slower ball off-cutter on a length on the stumps, Wellalage runs it down to third man
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, 2 runs, right in between three fielders at deep mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, no run, tossed up fullish on the stumps, Wellalage goes on the back foot and nudges to slip, did not pick it off the hand, did so off the pitch

Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, SIX, wow, Look at that shot and look at the reaction from Kuldeep Yadav who goes - that was good, The slogsweep from the stumps and clears the deep mid-wicket fence with ease
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, no run, confusion between both but all's well in the end
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, 2 runs, this is short and wide outside off, cut wide of sweeper cover for two
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, no run, Wellalage wanted to come down or at least feigned to do so, but the length is shortened and the ball turns past the bat
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, 1 run, Wellalage comes down the track and pushes it past Kuldeep Yadav for one
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, no run, slower and spin outside off, Wellalage looks to punch and misses
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, no run, fullish on off, steered to backward point
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, 2 runs, short and wide outside off, cut wide of sweeper cover and it's an easy two
Kuldeep Yadav to Wellalage, FOUR, Wellalage is not going to hang back
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, 1 run, flat good length on the stumps, Dhananjaya sinks low and smites to deep square leg
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, leg byes, 1 run, sliding down leg, Dhananjaya flicks and misses, off the pad for a legbye
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, no run, another flatter delivery on the stumps, turned to square leg
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, no run, flat good length on the stumps, defended off the back foot to mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Shanaka, 1 run, flat length delivery on off, Shanaka goes on the back foot to punch to long-on
Kuldeep Yadav to Shanaka, no run, Shanaka is very lucky
Kuldeep Yadav to Shanaka, no run, superb delivery, tossed up and goes the other way outside off as Shanaka going back to defend is beaten
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, no run, tossed up on off, Dhananjaya defends to the off-side
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, 2 runs, leg-lined delivery, Dhananjaya nurdles it backward of square leg and scampers back for the second
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, 2 runs, slower and turns in, Dhananjaya goes for the sweep and the top-edge balloons over leg slip, Jadeja tidies up
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, no run, drifts across off, Dhananjaya attempts the sweep and plays over it, beaten on the under-edge
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, no run, flighted on off, Dhananjaya prods forward and defends
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, no run, fraction short and Dhananjaya misses the flick to the leg-side, struck high on the pad
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, 1 run, slower but length is short, Dhananjaya tucks it round the corner
Kuldeep Yadav to Shanaka, 1 run, short of length around leg-stump, Shanaka punches it to deep mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Shanaka, no run, touch quicker on off, Shanaka defends it back to Kuldeep
Kuldeep Yadav to Shanaka, FOUR, offered a gift first up and Shanaka accepts it happily
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, out Caught by Rahul,, Second wicket for Kuldeep and he has sent back both set batters
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, no run, tossed up close to off, Asalanka blocks to the off-side
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, 1 run, slower but fraction short, Dhananjaya nudges it to deep square leg
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, no run, spinning into the hips, Dhananjaya tucks it towards leg slip and Gill makes a fine stop
Kuldeep Yadav to Dhananjaya, no run, floated up outside off, Dhananjaya pushes off the inner half to mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, out Stumped,, There's the wicket India desperately needed
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, no run, half an apppeal for LBW
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, 1 run, short and turning away, Asalanka late cuts and Jadeja makes an important interception near short third
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, no run, comes down the track and misses the flick, rapped on the pads but the ball was spinning
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, 1 run, tossed up on middle, Asalanka nudges it to square leg
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, 1 run, nurdled with the spin backward of square leg
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, 2 runs, short and drifted across, Samarawickrama cracks it in front of square and Axar stops it with his boot, the pair are content with a brace
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, 1 run, flighted outside off, Asalanka opens the bat face and eases it past cover
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, 1 run, spinning into leg-stump, Samarawickrama glances it to fine leg
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, no run, very full delivery outside off, Samarawickrama digs the drive towards cover
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, no run, tossed up around off, Samarawickrama drives it back to Kuldeep
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, 1 run, floated up on leg-stump, Asalanka nudges it to the vacant mid-wicket region
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, no run, slower and turning away, Asalanka directs it towards point
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, 1 run, comes down the track and works it with the spin to long-on

Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, 3 runs, flighted on off, Asalanka drags the sweep to fine leg and it is a long chase for a returning Bumrah, he gets there and manages to keep it in before the boundary rope
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, no run, drifted across off, Samarawickrama opens his front hip and pushes to mid-off
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, no run, slower and spinning in, Samarawickrama turns it gently to mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, no run, turning into the right hander, Samarawickrama works it to backward square
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, byes, 1 run, goes for the sweep and Asalanka misses, the ball stays low and hits Rahul on the pad before deflecting
Kuldeep Yadav to Asalanka, no run, India lose a review
Kuldeep Yadav to Samarawickrama, 1 run, flighted but short of length, Samarawickrama nurdles it to square leg
Hardik Pandya to Asalanka, no run, 130ks delivery around off, Asalanka taps it in front of cover
Hardik Pandya to Asalanka, no run, 131ks fuller and close to off, Asalanka blocks it to cover
Hardik Pandya to Asalanka, no run, 118ks slower ball on off, Asalanka plays it with soft hands to cover
Hardik Pandya to Samarawickrama, 1 run, fuller and in the channel, Samarawickrama prods forward and squirts an inside edge to fine leg
Hardik Pandya to Samarawickrama, no run, 128ks back of a length on off, Samarawickrama turns it to mid-on

Hardik Pandya to Samarawickrama, 2 runs, good length ball outside off, Samarawickrama pushes it in front of square on the off-side and Kishan races across from sweeper cover but can't prevent the second
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, out Caught by (sub)Suryakumar Yadav,, Mendis knew
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, 140ks very full and close to yorker length, Mendis digs it back to Bumrah
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, short and banged into the wicket, Mendis looks to upper cut but the ball goes past the top-edge
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, FOUR, that's more like it
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, angled in on middle and leg, Mendis tucks it wide of mid-wicket and rushes to the other end
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, 141ks short of length delivery, Mendis rides the bounce and punches to backward point
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, FOUR, streaky, Mendis goes for a wild slog across the line and the top-edge flies over the slip cordon
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, good length ball close to off, Mendis knocks it on top of the bounce to cover
Siraj to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, in the air and short of Gill
Siraj to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, good length ball outside off, Mendis is unsure to play or not and in the end he's late in lifting his bat, steers it to third man
Siraj to Kusal Mendis, FOUR, does not adjust to the right hander, drifts onto the pads and Mendis flicks it to deep square leg
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, wicket maiden, Fuller and angling in, Mendis prods forward and defends to the off-side
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, 136ks delivery close to off, Mendis gets behind the line and blocks to backward point
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, hits the bat hard with an in-angler, Mendis defends with soft hands
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, 138ks back of a length outside off, Mendis lifts his bat and lets it go
Bumrah to Kusal Mendis, no run, stifled appeal for LBW
Asalanka to Kuldeep Yadav, out Caught by Dhananjaya,, Two in two and Sri Lanka are on fire
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, out Caught by Kusal Mendis,, Maiden fifer for Wellalage
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, no run, full outside off, driven to cover
Asalanka to Ishan Kishan, out Caught by Wellalage,, Wellalage again
Asalanka to Ishan Kishan, no run, good length outside off, dabbed to backward point
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, no run, full on the stumps, pushed to cover
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, no run, the inside-edge onto the pads saves Hardik Pandya, gets forward to defend and gets some bat before pad
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, no run, what a ripper, Unplayable
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, good length on the middle and leg line, Ishan Kishan goes on the back foot to flick through square leg
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, full outside off, Hardik Pandya opens the face of the bat to push wide of backward point
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, no run, tossed up full outside off, Hardik Pandya gets outside off and misses the sweep, hit on the body
Asalanka to Hardik Pandya, leg byes, 1 run, Kusal Mendis appeals for a caught behind but is turned down
Asalanka to Hardik Pandya, no run, full on off, pushed back
Asalanka to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, full outside off, pushed wide of cover for a quick single
Asalanka to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, slower and gets sharp turn from outside off, Hardik Pandya dabs in front of short third man
Asalanka to Hardik Pandya, no run, flat offbreak on off, turned to mid-wicket
Asalanka to Hardik Pandya, no run, sharp offbreak on off-stump, Hardik Pandya gets forward to block
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, SIX, Ishan Kishan breaks the shackles
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, good length outside off, stays low, cut to sweeper cover
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, full on the stumps, Ishan Kishan gets forward to flick through mid-wicket
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, full on the stumps, Hardik Pandya gets forward and uses his reach to push wide of cover

Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, no run, ripper, Wellalage goes slightly wide of the crease and bowls a tossed up delivery that drifts in on middle, brings Hardik Pandya forward and then rips past the outside-edge
Wellalage to Hardik Pandya, no run, full on the stumps, pushed to cover
Asalanka to Ishan Kishan, no run, wow, What a ball
Asalanka to Ishan Kishan, no run, flat good length outside off, cut wide of point who gets across and cuts it off
Asalanka to Ishan Kishan, no run, full on off, Ishan Kishan gets forward to push to cover
Asalanka to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, good length and sliding on the middle and leg line, glanced to fine-leg and Hardik Pandya is off the mark
Asalanka to Hardik Pandya, no run, tossed up offbreak on the stumps, Hardik Pandya gets forward to defend to mid-wicket
Asalanka to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, tossed up full outside off, Ishan Kishan drives to sweeper cover
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, flat length delivery on the stumps, turned to the backward square leg region
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, tossed up full on the stumps, driven to long-on
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, sliding on with the angle and going on outside off, Ishan Kishan tries to dab and misses
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, flat offbreak just outside off, Ishan Kishan goes on the back foot to pull to deep mid-wicket
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, full on the stumps, Ishan Kishan gets forward to drive to long-on
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, flat good length on off, Ishan Kishan guides to short third man with an open face
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, Ishan Kishan misses out there, full down leg, Ishan Kishan sweeps and picks out short fine-leg
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, slower and holds the length back, Kishan is drawn into the forward block and the ball spins past the outside edge
Theekshana to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, quicker and at the stumps, Kishan nudges it square on the leg-side
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, drifts in with the angle, Kishan works it straight to mid-wicket
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, flatter and around off, Kishan punches to cover and Samarwickrama flings the ball at the batter
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, "catch it" were some of the calls but luckily for Kishan the ball does not carry
Theekshana to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, quicker and at the stumps, Kishan nudges wide of mid-wicket
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, quicker and spins away sharply, Kishan looks to steer and is beaten on the outside edge
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, tossed up close to off, Kishan opens the bat face and directs to backward point
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, floated up teasingly, Kishan drills it back at DDS and he takes the pace off the ball, just a single
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, slower and drawing Kishan into the forward defensive
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, fraction short and drifts in, Kishan punches it firmly to mid-wicket
Theekshana to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, flatter and fraction short, Kishan cracks it square on the off-side
Theekshana to Ishan Kishan, 2 runs, drifted across the left hander, Kishan angles it to backward point and Asalanka fumbles, extra run conceded
Theekshana to Ishan Kishan, no run, 100ks delivery at the stumps, Kishan defends back to Theekshana
Theekshana to Ishan Kishan, wide, splays down leg, Kishan misses the glance and it is given as wide
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, floated up wider of off-stump, Kishan pushes it wide of cover
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, short but spins away and stays low, Kishan was shaping to cut but ends up stabbing it back down the wicket
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, flatter and bit of extra bounce, Kishan defends it back to DDS
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, quicker and fraction short, Kishan knocks it to the left of DDS
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, slower and on off-stump, Kishan defends with the bat and pad together
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, floated up outside off, Kishan mistimes the drive to mid-off and sets off, sprints across and makes it in before the ball hits the stumps and deflects away
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, drifted across the left hander, Kishan pushes it back to Wellalage
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, comes down the track, converts it into a full pitcher and drills it to mid-off
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, quicker and attacking the stumps, Kishan blocks in front of mid-wicket
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, flighted and turning in, Kishan defends solidly back to Wellalage
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, flighted around off, Kishan blocks to the off-side
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, tad short and outside off, Kishan cuts square and Nissanka keeps it to a single
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, tosses it up on off, Kishan presses forward and pushes to cover
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, flighted around off, Kishan plays it with soft hands towards point and the duo cross over
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, spinning into leg, Kishan leans forward and nurdles it backward of square
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, tad quicker and outside off, Kishan blocks it towards cover
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, tosses it up invitingly and Kishan takes it on, smacks it straight back over Rahul and long-on has no chance
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, spinning from short of length, Kishan blocks to the left of Wellalage
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, loopy delivery on off, Kishan toe-ends the drive back to DDS
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, flatter and drifts in, Kishan punches it down to long-on
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, more flight and fuller in length, Kishan drives to long-off
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, flatter and slides in, Kishan brings his bat down and keeps it out
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, turns in a long way, Kishan chips it aerially past Rahul and down to long-on
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, spins in from outside off, Kishan hangs back and defends
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, sliding into the pads, Kishan tucks it straight to backward square
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, floated up too full, Kishan mistimes the drive to cover
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, flighted outside off, Kishan attempts to cut but can only chop it to the off-side
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, holds the length back, Kishan pushes it off the inner half to mid-wicket
Dhananjaya to Ishan Kishan, no run, drifts in with the angle, Kishan blocks to the left of DDS
Wellalage to Ishan Kishan, no run, wicket maiden, Flighted and turns in, Kishan leans forward and defends to the on-side
Wellalage to Shubman Gill, out Bowled,, Cleaned up, What a ball, Wellalage has produced a jaffa first up to break the partnership
Pathirana to Shubman Gill, 1 run, 142ks full and at the stumps, Gill flicks wide of mid-on and Theekshana makes a diving stop
Pathirana to Shubman Gill, FOUR, no maiden for Pathirana
Pathirana to Shubman Gill, no run, 144ks short and outside off, Gill chops the cut towards cover-point
Pathirana to Shubman Gill, no run, dipping slower ball on leg, Gill digs it out to mid-wicket
Pathirana to Shubman Gill, no run, short of length around off, Gill rides the bounce and punches to cover-point
Pathirana to Shubman Gill, no run, 141ks slingy into the pads, Gill clips it straight to square leg
Pathirana to Shubman Gill, no run, full delivery on leg-stump, Gill leans forward and gently turns it to mid-wicket
Shanaka to Shubman Gill, 1 run, on a length and outside off, Gill opens the bat face and guides it to third man
Shanaka to Shubman Gill, no run, walks down the wicket and is made to reach for the delivery outside off, knocks it back to Shanaka
Shanaka to Shubman Gill, no run, fuller and around off, Gill prods forward and defends to the off-side
Shanaka to Shubman Gill, 1 run, 122ks short of length delivery, Gill plays a controlled cut to deep backward point
Shanaka to Shubman Gill, no run, missed out there
Shanaka to Shubman Gill, no run, 124ks fullish delivery around off, Gill works it wristily to mid-on
Shanaka to Shubman Gill, no run, 121ks good length ball on off, Gill prods forward and blocks it back
Rajitha to Shubman Gill, 1 run, on a length and outside off, Gill opens the bat face and guides to third man
Rajitha to Shubman Gill, wide, slower ball sprayed down leg, no chance for Gill to make contact and Kusal Mendis parries it to short fine
Rajitha to Shubman Gill, 2 runs, excellent work by Wellalage
Rajitha to Shubman Gill, FOUR, shot, Gill advances down the pitch, makes it into a fullish delivery and lofts through the line over mid-off, couple of bounces and over the rope
Rajitha to Shubman Gill, no run, 137ks back of a length delivery, Gill rides the bounce and knocks it to short cover-point
Theekshana to Shubman Gill, 1 run, 98ks flatter and shorter, Gill punches to long-on
Rajitha to Shubman Gill, 1 run, good length ball and stays low, Gill toe-ends the cut past backward point
Theekshana to Shubman Gill, no run, 97ks short of length delivery, Gill knocks it back to Theekshana
Theekshana to Shubman Gill, 1 run, 93ks delivery drifts into the pads, Gill nudges to deep square leg
Theekshana to Shubman Gill, no run, 90ks carrom ball outside off, Gill defends to cover
Rajitha to Shubman Gill, 2 runs, angled into the pads, Gill flicks it past mid-wicket and gets off the mark with a brace
